official_title: A bill to extend duty-free treatment to prayer shawls, bags for the keeping of prayer shawls, and certain headware used in religious observances.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to permit the duty-free entry of prayer shawls, bags for such shawls, and religious headwear.

titles.title: A bill to extend duty-free treatment to prayer shawls, bags for the keeping of prayer shawls, and certain headware used in religious observances.
